itunes:summary:
Dave Rubin breaks down the leaked Supreme Court draft discussing overturning Roe v. Wade, why whoever leaked the document needs to be found and prosecuted, what makes Ron DeSantis such a great governor, and who the Democrats are going to run in 2024 (because it definitely won't be Joe Biden).
